articles.title: Kamala Harris has already lost momentum: Pollsters
articles.description: The polling by InsiderAdvantage and Trafalgar in seven battleground states finds Trump on a path to 296 electoral votes — suggesting that Harris has already lost her momentum.
articles.content:
Most swing state polls show Vice President Kamala Harris leading in the swing states that will decide the election. But two southern state pollsters are bucking the trend — and they’ve got former President Donald Trump up big.
